docs.snippet: Clutching the lid of a fancy candy box in which he was believed to have kept valuable papers, Alphonse Lamy, 58-year-old bachelor, who was the senior partner in a small metal strip concern, was found murdered yesterday afternoon, in his three-room...
docs.lead_paragraph: Clutching the lid of a fancy candy box in which he was believed to have kept valuable papers, Alphonse Lamy, 58-year-old bachelor, who was the senior partner in a small metal strip concern, was found murdered yesterday afternoon, in his three-room apartment at 21-68 Thirty-fifty Street, Astoria, Queens.
docs.abstract: Made honorary member of Downtown Athletic Club

headline.main: MERCHANT IS SLAIN IN HOME IN ASTORIA; Head of Metal-Strip Concern Is Found Beaten to Death With Box Clutched in His Hand. PAPERS BELIEVED STOLEN Victim Had Bought Candy Container "to Keep Valuables In" -- Body Discovered by Partner.

docs.snippet: LEXINGTON, Ky., Dec. 20. -- To-night before the Lexington Chess Club the champion, H.N. Pillsbury of Wheeling, West Va., played a blindfolded exhibition game carrying twelve boards at one time. The noted player Showalter of Georgetown was present....
docs.lead_paragraph: LEXINGTON, Ky., Dec. 20. -- To-night before the Lexington Chess Club the champion, H.N. Pillsbury of Wheeling, West Va., played a blindfolded exhibition game carrying twelve boards at one time. The noted player Showalter of Georgetown was present. Pillsbury plays in a tournament in Louisville, Thursday, Fridays, and Saturdays.
